description: Connect your Oura Ring account and enable access to your wellness data in apps and automations. Initiate sign-in and complete authorization seamlessly to link accounts.

capabilities.name: get_auth_url
capabilities.description: Get OAuth2 authorization URL to connect your Oura Ring account.

capabilities.name: exchange_code
capabilities.description: Exchange authorization code for access token.

capabilities.name: parse_redirect_url
capabilities.description: Parse OAuth2 redirect URL and automatically extract token/code.

capabilities.name: set_access_token
capabilities.description: Manually set the access token in session configuration.

capabilities.name: get_sleep_last_night
capabilities.description: Get sleep data from last night.

capabilities.name: get_sleep_last_week
capabilities.description: Get sleep data from the past week.

capabilities.name: get_sleep_by_date
capabilities.description: Get sleep data for a specific date (YYYY-MM-DD format).
